title: No problem
creator_credit: Karl McPhee, Don Harley and Film Australia
brief_description: The problem of alcoholism and its effects on the community. Demonstrates that supervisors in business or industry, who cover up for employees with this disease are really aggravating the situation rather than helping. Two alcoholics discuss their fight against the problem.
creator_credit_for_label: Karl McPhee, Don Harley and Film Australia
